article_title: Florida Sports Bar Scores Controversy With Obamacare Surcharge On Meals

article_metadata.description: Would you pay more for food if the money was supposedly earmarked to pay health care premiums for employees? One franchise is putting that question to a test.
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb
